detectors.description:
LinearBondingCurve.calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/linear-curve/LinearBondingCurve.sol#121-161) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- rawSaleReturn = amount * PRECISION / _totalCost(n + 1) (src/linear-curve/LinearBondingCurve.sol#137)
	- fees = (rawSaleReturn * protocolFeePercent) / PRECISION (src/linear-curve/LinearBondingCurve.sol#138)

detectors.description:

	- fees = ((reserveTokensReceived * PRECISION / (protocolFeePercent + PRECISION)) * protocolFeePercent) / PRECISION (src/linear-curve/LinearBondingCurve.sol#79)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LinearToken.burnTokens(uint256) (src/linear-curve/LinearToken.sol#112-146):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = i_bondingCurve.protocolFeeDestination().call{value: fees}() (src/linear-curve/LinearToken.sol#136)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,None) = i_bondingCurve.protocolFeeDestination().call{value: fees}() (src/linear-curve/LinearToken.sol#136)
	- address(msg.sender).transfer(salePrice) (src/linear-curve/LinearToken.sol#142)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokensSold(msg.sender,salePrice,fees,amount) (src/linear-curve/LinearToken.sol#145)
